name: Migration (Bingyan Studio)
description:
The world is collapsing. The lonely father and his son need to keep midrating to survive in the cruel world.

To survive in the game, yhou need to spend your stamina to push your house, collect resources to update your house and your equipment. You can collect berries to restore stamina.

When your bag is full, you need to go back to your house and put things into your house. The resource blocks will disapear when they are collected, so you can clean a way to move your house by collecting.

大陆正在不断崩坏，相依为命的父子二人需要不断迁徙才能在末世中生存下去。

你需要耗费你的精力（左上角的槽是精力槽）来推动房子，如果你精力不足，可以通过采集浆果来恢复精力。 你可以采集别的资源来获得木头、石块和铁块。

你的背包有容量上限，当你的背包满时，你需要回到房子旁边放下资源，否则不能继续采集。 

当地图上的资源块被采集完时，它会消失。你也可以通过采集动作来为房子开辟一条畅通的道路。 

This game was made for Global Game Jam:https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/migration
